posts.post_content:
Let's propose neat abilities for the vanilla creatures that get printed in each new core set. Who knows, a bored Wizards developer may happen upon one...  
  
---  
  
Bludgeon ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) *(When Warpath Ghoul does damage to a player, you may pay ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol). If you do, Warpath Ghoul does damage equal to its power to target creature that player controls.)*
posts.html:
Let's propose neat abilities for the vanilla creatures that get printed in each new core set. Who knows, a bored Wizards developer may happen upon one...

---

Bludgeon (When Warpath Ghoul does damage to a player, you may pay . If you do, Warpath Ghoul does damage equal to its power to target creature that player controls.)
